title: Solomon Island treasures
creator_credit: Ian Walker, Don Murray and Film Australia
brief_description: Depicts Solomon Islands men and women displaying traditional skills and techniques. Provides an insight into the lifestyle of the people and the myths and legends interpreted in their art.
